analysis.description:
Transfer.transfer (/unique_chucks/27/0x0fe70e559f825a3d548f44e51d2812d266099828.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-t.transfer(aa[i],bb[i]) (/unique_chucks/27/0x0fe70e559f825a3d548f44e51d2812d266099828.sol)

Token.Token.isSecured (local variable @ /unique_chucks/27/0x0fe70e559f825a3d548f44e51d2812d266099828.sol#30) shadows:
	- Token.isSecured (state variable @ /unique_chucks/27/0x0fe70e559f825a3d548f44e51d2812d266099828.sol#15-16)
